00011 double Algorithm::MaxBinAmplitude::operator() (const TPulseIsland* tpi) {
00012 
00013   // Get the samples and get an iterator ready to find the peak sample
00014   std::vector<int> pulseSamples = tpi->GetSamples();  
00015   std::vector<int>::iterator peak_sample_pos;
00016 
00017   // Find the position of the peak samples
00018   if (trigger_polarity == 1)
00019     peak_sample_pos = std::max_element(pulseSamples.begin(), pulseSamples.end());
00020   else if (trigger_polarity == -1)
00021     peak_sample_pos = std::min_element(pulseSamples.begin(), pulseSamples.end());
00022 
00023   // Now calculate the amplitude
00024   double amplitude = trigger_polarity*(*peak_sample_pos - pedestal);
00025 
00026   return amplitude;
00027 }

00029 double Algorithm::MaxBinTime::operator() (const TPulseIsland* tpi) {
00030 
00031   // Get the samples and get an iterator ready to find the peak sample
00032   std::vector<int> pulseSamples = tpi->GetSamples();  
00033   std::vector<int>::iterator peak_sample_pos;
00034 
00035   // Find the position of the peak samples
00036   if (trigger_polarity == 1)
00037     peak_sample_pos = std::max_element(pulseSamples.begin(), pulseSamples.end());
00038   else if (trigger_polarity == -1)
00039     peak_sample_pos = std::min_element(pulseSamples.begin(), pulseSamples.end());
00040 
00041   // Now calculate the time
00042   double time = ((tpi->GetTimeStamp() + (peak_sample_pos - pulseSamples.begin())) * clock_tick_in_ns) - time_shift;
00043 
00044   return time;
00045 }

00047 double Algorithm::ConstantFractionTime::operator() (const TPulseIsland* tpi) {
00048 
00049   const std::vector<int>& samps = tpi->GetSamples();
00050   std::vector<int>::const_iterator b = samps.begin(), e = samps.end();
00051 
00052   std::vector<int>::const_iterator m = trigger_polarity > 0 ? std::max_element(b, e) : std::min_element(b, e);
00053   const int amp = *m;
00054   const unsigned int cf = trigger_polarity > 0 ?
00055       (unsigned int)(constant_fraction*(double)(amp-pedestal)) + pedestal :
00056       (unsigned int)((double)(pedestal-amp)*(1.-constant_fraction) + amp);
00057   while (m != b && (trigger_polarity > 0 ? *--m > (int)cf : *--m < (int)cf));
00058   double dx = (double)(m-b);
00059   if (*(m+1) != *m)
00060     dx += (double)((int)cf - *m)/(double)(*(m+1) - *m);
00061 
00062   return (dx + (double)tpi->GetTimeStamp()) * clock_tick_in_ns - time_shift;
00063 }
00064 
00065 double Algorithm::SimpleIntegral::operator() (const TPulseIsland* tpi) {
00066   const std::vector<int>& samples = tpi->GetSamples();
00067   
00068   double length = samples.size();
00069   double tempint = 0;
00070   for(std::vector<int>::const_iterator sIt = samples.begin(); sIt != samples.end(); sIt++)
00071     tempint += *sIt;
00072   
00073   double integral = trigger_polarity * (tempint - (pedestal * length));
00074 
00075   return integral;
00076 }
